name: Digital Media Lab
description: The Digital Media Lab (DML) has workstations with audiovisual editing software including: three reservable 5k iMacs for video editing, two reservable programming PCs, four reservable music booths, and a reservable studio space with a green screen which also contains equipment for VHS and DV transfer, audio production, and slide scanning.

address.streetAddress: 2 Broughton Drive, Campus Box 7132, Raleigh, NC 27606
